headline: Unlock Your Race Crucible Data: A Step-by-Step Guide to the Results Explorer
text:
You've pushed through the pain, crossed the finish line, and earned your time. But what's the story behind your performance? The ASEAN Fitness Games Results Explorer is a powerful tool built to help you debrief your race, analyze every station, and visualize your strengths. It's packed with personalized data, comprehensive results, and in-depth blog posts to help you train smarter for your next event.

With just a few clicks, you can transform your race results into powerful, personalized graphics that show you exactly how you stack up against the competition. This guide will walk you through the simple steps to find your own custom-generated report.

Step 1: Find the App via Instagram

The easiest way to get started is by heading over to our Instagram profile, @RedlineResults. Once there, you'll see a link in our bio. Clicking this link will take you to our Linktree, which has all the important destinations in one place. Select the "ASEAN Fitness Games Results Explorer" to begin.

Step 2: Navigate to the Search Function

Once you're on the app's homepage, you'll see a navigation bar at the top. While there's plenty to explore, including past results and blog posts, we're heading straight for the Search page. You can also use the "Competitor Search" link directly on the homepage to get there.

Step 3: Search for Your Name

This is where the magic begins. In the search box, type your first name, last name, or even a team name. The search is flexible! Once you've entered your name, click the "Search" button. The app will pull up all matching results from the 2023, 2024, and 2025 events. Find the specific race you're looking for and click on it to dive into the details.

Step 4: Your Personalized Dashboard

Success! You've arrived at your personal race day dashboard. The first thing you'll see is a text summary of your performance. This includes your official Net Time, overall position, and category rank. Below that, you'll find a detailed table with your split times for every single station, along with your rank and category rank for each one. This is perfect for quickly identifying where you excelled and where there's room for improvement.

Step 5: Unlock Your Personalised Graphics

This is what sets the Results Explorer apart. Scroll down, and you'll find a gallery of custom graphics generated just for you. These visuals are designed to give you a deeper understanding of your race performance. You'll see:

  • Time Distribution Histograms: See how your time on each station compares to the rest of the competition. Are you in the top 2%, or middle of the pack?
  • Performance Breakdowns: Bar charts that show your relative strengths and weaknesses.
  • Radar Charts: A complete 360-degree view of your athletic profile.
  • And many more! Explore violin plots, scatter charts, and cumulative time graphs to get the full picture.

Start Exploring Now!

You've already done the hard work on the competition floor. Now it's time to unlock the data behind your performance. Follow these steps to find your results, share your graphics, and start planning your strategy for the next race. While you're there, be sure to check out the other event results and our in-depth blog posts.

Ready to see your data? Head over to the ASEAN Fitness Games Results Explorer Search function and start your journey!
